features: 【Tree Bookshelf】: tree bookshelf not only provides ample storage space, but also can be used as a unique decoration in the living room. Industrial style independent open design, easy reach, perfect display for book, CD and magazine.

【Strong and Sturdy】: Book rack is mixing of metal and wood shelves made of high-grade MDF and laminate, rustic industrial appearance, and also hold multiple items for a strong, reliable organization solution.We dont sacrifice price for quality so you can get best price for durable product.

【Protect books】: What annoys you the most among all the clutter you have in your home? Most probably, those piled up books have been curled up in some corners and corners of your home.. If you have pets, your shoes may become a delicacy, causing expensive books to be damaged and dirty. All these problems will vanish when you invest in the bookrack.

【High capacity】: We know that not having enough space can be annoying. That’s why we designed large space shelf stores books or other items. Perfect in any room! Works great in the bedroom or the living room. it only takes little space but meets your daily demands.

【Friendly Service & Easy Assembly】: Comes with all needed accessories and step-by-step instruction, It is easily and conveniently to install. All products come with 30-day money-back for any reason and 12-month for quality-related issues. Buy with confidence, we are always behind you. Attention: please gentle when attaching the top screw, or it will drill out the board.

Special frame structure： Frame structure pads ensure the bookshelf strong stability, No worry of wobble. Not least, everything is made to last with high-quality finishing and meticulous craftsmanship.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Tight Space!
reviews.reviewText: Wanted a clever looking bookcase for a tight space that could double as a stand/side table for my morning coffee or evening drink. This fit the bill perfectly. All pieces were numbered, directions easy to understand, and it was only one person (me) to put it together. Lay everything out, pay attention to the holes in the pictures compared to the holes in your pieces… easy… had it all together and upright within 30 minutes. I do love the look, it holds a lot of books, and with my gliding chair at an angle in a pretty full room, I only had the small space to work with. This is stable, I don’t feel the need to secure it to the wall at all. 4 stars vs 5 is purely technical because there were a couple of places where the seams of the bars weren’t perfectly closed, but no one other than me would notice. Overall I’m very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this book shelf! It isn’t at all expensive, but is cute enough to make up for that. Holds plenty of various sized books neatly. It was a pain to assemble. Directions are fine; just go slow and steady with two people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the second shelf I received. The first shelf had missing instructions and a stripped hex key. The company sent me a replacement and accepted my botched attempt at putting the first one together. And it was worth the wait and I promised I would come back with a review (:For reference I’m a very handy female and I was able to put this together by myself effortlessly.I decided to work smarter this second time around and just swap the 36 hex screws for traditional screws of the same size so I can use my small drill. Needless to say I had this together in 30 minutes flat (including time to peel off the pesky stickers)This is super simple to put together and will be a great addition to my library. It looks just like the picture and will be sturdy enough to hold many books!Thank you so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good, great price
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this bookshelf! It is modern, stylish and just the right size. I was not prepared for how heavy this bookshelf was when I picked up its delivery box off my porch! I was pleased with this fact however as it suggested to me that it would be sturdy and wouldn't tip. Upon assembly, I found these presumptions to be correct. I did not have any trouble assembling it. The instructions were clear and concise. The company lists six points of contact to reach them if I had needed to reach out though. That was nice to see. The bookshelf came well packaged so each of the pieces all came in pristine condition. I have purchased other items where this wasn't the case so I appreciate the perfect packaging job. I styled the bookshelf by stacking my books in a herringbone pattern and used the top of the bookshelf to display a plant. For the individual looking to bring an aestetically pleasing, functional piece of furniture into your space, I recommend this awesome bookshelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks good, but missing correct hex key
reviews.reviewText: The product looks great, exactly as pictured, stands up well on its own, no wobbling, and a nice flat wooden panel on top. If you put your heaviest books towards the bottom, you will have an extremely stable sturdy and compact bookshelf!I knocked it down one star because the assembly takes a long time, around an hour and a half, and my shipment was missing one of the hex keys. If you want to make sure you can assemble this yourself at home, you will need at least: one 3mm hex key, two 4mm hex keys. My package contained three 4mm hex keys, so for most people that would make it impossible to put together. Fortunately, I had a 3mm hex key adapter for my ratchet, which is the way to go for this assembly anyways because there are NEARLY 50 SCREWS and power tools are probably not going to fit between the shelves during assembly. I don't recommend that anyone try to put this together using the stupid little 3mm hex key anyways, even if it came in your box. Photos include the tools I used including three 4mm hex keys (of which one is redundant/unnecessary), as well as the ratchet and front page of the (very clear) instructions.Recommendation for manufacturer: you need to include the 3mm hex key, but ideally scrap the key in favor of a screwdriver with a 3mm hex head. I can't imagine actually doing this install with a 3mm hex key, it would probably take 2-3 hours and leave you with an aching wrist/forearm.
